script.introduction: Hello, this is Thank you for participating in Taste Challengego. To receive your two trial packs of our leading

questions.question: Are you a cigarette smoker 21 years of age or older?
1A. May I have your date of birth, please?
1B. Then may I have your age?
1C. I'm sorry this offer is only for smokers 21 years of age or older. Thank you for calling.
2. May I have your name, please?
questions.instructions: Verify full name include title last name, first name & middle initial, continue at 3

questions.question: 3. May I have your home phone number, with the area code first?
4. May I have your home address?
questions.instructions: Verify complete address: street, apartment # if any, city, state and zip.
questions.note: If the state consumer lives in is Iowa, Minnesota, New Hampshire, or Utah, please read: 'We're very sorry, but due to government restrictions in your state, we're not able to allow your participation in this program.' All other states, continue at 5

questions.question: 5. What is your regular brand of cigarettes, that is, the brand you smoke most often?
questions.instructions: Select brand from brand table and record. If caller insists they smoke two brands, ask them to select one they smoke most often and record that brand. Do not offer brand suggestions or repeat brand name in any way.

questions.question: 5A. Are your cigarettes Full Flavor, Lights, or Ultra Lights?
